block.tooltip.weloveredstone.or_gate_blo: Turns on when any of its inputs are on.
block.tooltip.weloveredstone.and_gate_bl:
Turns on when one of the side inputs
and the middle input are both on.
block.tooltip.weloveredstone.xor_gate_bl:
Turns on when an odd number of
inputs is on.
block.tooltip.weloveredstone.half_adder_:
Adds together two binary digits,
outputting the result at the top
and the carry on the left.
block.tooltip.weloveredstone.multiplexer:
Outputs either the value of either
the left or right input depending on if
the bottom input is on.
block.tooltip.weloveredstone.demultiplex:
Outputs the value of the top input
to either the left or right output
depending on if the bottom input is on.
